item.title: CVE-2021-24046|2024-08-03T19:21:17.360Z -- meta%20platforms%2C%20inc -- ray-ban%C2%AE%20stories%20smart%20glasses
item.description: A logic flaw in Ray-BanÂ® Stories device software allowed some parameters like video capture duration limit to be modified through the Facebook View application. This issue affected versions of device software before 2107460.6810.0.
